dont_catch_falling_knife.title: Don't catch falling knives
dont_catch_falling_knife.description: RSI oversold in a downtrend often goes MORE oversold. Wait for reversal confirmation.

volume_confirms_breakout.title: Volume confirms breakouts
volume_confirms_breakout.description: Breakouts with 2x+ volume are much more reliable than low-volume breakouts.

beware_pump_and_dump.title: Beware pump and dump patterns
beware_pump_and_dump.description: Small cap + huge volume spike + no news = likely pump and dump. Don't chase.

trend_is_friend.title: Trend is your friend
trend_is_friend.description: Trading WITH the trend (above SMA50, SMA200) has much higher success rate.
